p: For the dual-tag co-IP-WB for NP oligomerization ( Supplementary Figure S1), we used RIPA buffer (50 mM Tris pH 6.8, 150 mM NaCl, 0.5% ( w/ v) sodium deoxycholate, 1% ( w/ v) Triton X-100 (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA)) both as the lysis and wash buffer because the NPâ€“NP interaction was very strong [ 53].
